1.title: The Ingredients
1.plot: In this first segment we take a closer look into the ingredients that led to the build up to the US war in Iran and Syria.

2.title: Nothing Else Matters
2.plot: In this second segment we follow Israel as it battles the Palestinians. The President of the United States resurrects the 'WMD' scare, while Bashar al-Assad, the Syrian President, attempts to get control of his country.

3.title: Terrorists And Takfiris
3.plot: In the third chapter we follow the war on Syria and why the west is losing.

4.title: Chemical Romance
4.plot: In this fourth chapter of Genocide we examine the chemical romance of the West between sarin gas and Al Nusra front, who would later lead factions in ISIS/ISIL. Turkey joins the fray, leading to an uprising across the former Ottoman Empire, but not before terrorist supplied with chemical weapons are caught in the southern border with Syria. And Russia continues to stop all foreign intervention from the eager western empires.

imdb.plot outline: A Recipe For Genocide, is a book of accounts for future generations documenting western imperialism, direct support for terrorists and their activities, and the result of endless invasions and occupations and throughout the first 15 years of the 21st Century.
